client_db module¶

class client_db.ClientStorage¶

Bases: object

Declares clients database and methods to work with it. Uses SQLite and SQLAlchemy ORM.

class Base(**kwargs: Any)¶

Bases: object

The base class of the class hierarchy.

When called, it accepts no arguments and returns a new featureless instance that has no instance attributes and cannot be given any.

metadata: MetaData = MetaData()¶
registry: registry = <sqlalchemy.orm.decl_api.registry object>¶
class Contacts(name)¶

Bases: Base

Table to store user’s contacts.

class MessageHistory(sender_name, receiver_name, message)¶

Bases: Base

Table to store message history.

id¶
message¶

get_contacts()¶

Returns list of contacts from Contacts table

get_history()¶

Returns message history as list of tuples

save_contact(name)¶

Add new contacts to Contacts table

save_message(sendername, receivername, message)¶

Saves message with sender and receiver names to MessageHistory table
